title: Implement 'wreckit strategy' command (Strategy Layer)
overview: Implement a hierarchical control layer where `wreckit strategy` manages a `ROADMAP.md` file. This command should: 1. Analyze the project (Mission vs Reality). 2. Identify Gaps (Spec compliance), Discoveries (Benchmarks), and Innovations. 3. Update `ROADMAP.md` with prioritized milestones. 4. Provide a mechanism (`wreckit execute-roadmap`) to convert active Roadmap milestones into Wreckit Items. This avoids the "Feature Factory" trap by introducing a governance layer.
success_criteria: 'wreckit strategy' command analyzes src/, specs/, and benchmark_results.md
ROADMAP.md is managed as the strategic state artifact
'wreckit execute-roadmap' converts active Roadmap milestones into Wreckit Items
Hierarchical Control Loop is established: Strategy -> Plan -> Implement
